metadata.title: CVE-2021-31866 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.0.9 and 4.1.x before 4.1.3 allows an attacker to learn the values of internal authentication keys by observing timing differences in string comparison operations within SysController and MailHandlerController.

criterions.comment: redmine package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
